item.description: Selling Shorts Naked - AKA Naked Short Selling # Link to another article that explores the same issue explored here. The article also goes on to discuss something called Reverse Stock Split - basicall where (unscrupulous) naked short sellers go to die. I think you came here to learn why someone would sell their shorts naked. I can explain, because I read a bunch of papers [link], which helped me recreate the totally accurate events between Point72, Citadel and Melvin that led to the greatest Short Squeeze (that is yet to happen) on GameStop (G or R18+ versions available).
